ai.behavior:
!when ally has vigor hidden and enemy is class sniper use -Mass Hide- on ally
!when ally has effect -Gift Of Steel- and it has 1 movement use -Gift Of Steel- on it
!when self has minion -Bitter Totem- and 1 nearby ally and 1 nearby enemy use -Summon Bitter Totem- on enemy within 2 squareRadius
!when self has minion -Bitter Totem- and 1 nearby ranged ally use -Summon Bitter Totem-
!when self has minion -War Totem- use -Summon War Totem- to ally within 2 squareRadius
when use Move to most melee ally
